scenario_text.value: Uuugh I’m SOOO tired. This camp is weak!

Ah well, at least we get a few bars out here.
We can kill a little time with that.

For real?! I can’t even get a signal in the
school building...

Ha ha man, what a hunk of junk you’re
lugging around!

Hey, don’t you think that Shuuji’s kinda
a pain in the ass?

He thinks he can order us around just because
he’s a little older? Like, back off, dude.
